topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fab99663687203adc40000#post_53fab99663687203adc40000
It would take me fucking ages to explain what touhou is and my internet gets shut off in forty minutes to which I'm spending watching kamen rider.
What about watching two episodes at least?
"Fantasy Kaleidoscope red mist incident episode 1":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqM5hjcf48E
"red mist incident episode 2":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEff2L_ry5k

What about spending thirty minutes watching a fan anime?  You said you don't want to spend the time reading the manga, what about thirty minutes for a fan anime?
